◎ About

Built for the modern CFO

We started Accountium because we kept watching great companies struggle with accounting software that was built for a world before AI. We're changing that.

✦ Our mission

Make financial clarity
accessible to every business.

Most accounting software treats AI as a bolt-on feature. We built Accountium with AI at the center — so the system gets smarter the longer you use it, automatically adapting to your business model, industry, and preferences.

We believe that when financial operations are truly automated, finance teams can stop firefighting and start driving strategy. That's the future we're building.

2,400+ Finance teams
98.7% AI accuracy rate
$2.4B+ Transactions processed
4.9/5 Average rating

⬒ Our values

What guides every decision

✦

Accuracy first

Wrong numbers cost businesses money and trust. Every feature we ship is tested for precision before speed.

◈

Simple by design

Accounting is already complex. Our job is to make the software feel effortless — even for non-accountants.

⬡

AI with guardrails

We believe AI should augment human judgment, not replace it. Everything our AI does can be reviewed and corrected.

⊙

Security as a foundation

Financial data is sensitive. We are SOC 2 Type II certified, encrypted end-to-end, and audited annually.

⊞ Security & compliance

SOC 2 Type II

Independently audited annually

TLS 1.3 Encryption

All data encrypted in transit

AES-256 at Rest

Database-level encryption

GDPR Compliant

Full data portability & deletion

99.9% Uptime SLA

On Growth & Scale plans

Role-Based Access

Granular permissions per user
